title: The Tale of the Flopsy Bunnies
description: Peter Rabbit and Benjamin Bunny are brought together once more in this exciting tale of danger and friendship.When the cupboard is bare at the Flopsy Bunny's burrow, the family all have to go in search of food. They soon find some old lettuces on Mr. McGregor's rubbish heap, but who can imagine the horrors that await them as they enjoy a nap after lunch!
author: Beatrix Potter
